{{Change History/Header}}
[[Version 2.4]]
* Coral Defenders was released.
* '''2022-01-14:''' The HP Loss inflicted by the Cleansing Shower attack was reduced.
** Old Formula:<br><math>\text{HP Loss} = ( 30 \% \times \text{Character Max HP} + 1800 ) \times ( 1 - \frac{\text{Remaining Energy}}{30} )</math>
** New Formula:<br><math>\text{HP Loss} = ( 17 \% \times \text{Character Max HP} + 600 ) \times ( 1 - \frac{\text{Remaining Energy}}{30} )</math>
